Sept. 1, 1923 D Trawden Contest
Trawden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
trawden-contest
None
Mirella [arr. Godfrey]
Trawden, Colne, Lancashire March: 1. Sowerby, 2. Lindley Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £5, 5th £2. Best soprano - Haworth. Best trombone - Goodshaw. Best horn - Lowerhouse Mills. Best euphonium - Sowerby Bridge. Best cornet - Keighley. 7 bands competed
Jan. 20, 2014, 2:23 p.m. Oct. 24, 2018, 11:38 a.m.

2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band W. Pollard
